faqs.question: Can I change my plan at any time?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and billing is prorated accordingly.

faqs.question: How does the Family plan pricing work?
faqs.answer: The Family plan costs ₹150 per member per month (₹110 per member for yearly). You can have 3-8 family members, so monthly costs range from ₹450 to ₹1,200. Yearly billing offers 26.6% savings with costs ranging from ₹3,960 to ₹10,560 per year.

faqs.question: What devices does Back&Bone support?
faqs.answer: Back&Bone works on iOS and Android smartphones and tablets. We also integrate with 50+ wearable devices including Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin, and more.

faqs.question: Do you offer student or military discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer 50% off Plus and Pro plans for verified students and active military personnel. Contact support with your credentials to apply.

faqs.question: What happens to my data if I cancel?
faqs.answer: Your workout history and progress data are safely stored for 12 months after cancellation. You can export your data at any time or reactivate your account to restore full access.

faqs.question: Can children use the Family plan?
faqs.answer: Yes! The Family plan includes parental controls and age-appropriate content. Children under 13 require parental supervision, and workout plans are automatically adjusted based on age and fitness level.
